title: First-Round NFL Draft Observations and Aaron Rodgers's Future With Kevin Clark
description:
Russillo shares his thoughts on the first round of the NFL draft (1:30) and talks with Kevin Clark about the news that Aaron Rodgers does not wish to return to the Packers next season, Trey Lance to the 49ers, Mac Jones to the Patriots, Justin Fields to the Bears, good and bad draft fits, and more (14:30) before tailing off into an F1 racing segment (47:00). Finally, Ryen answers some listener-submitted Life Advice questions (1:22:00).

Host: Ryen Russillo
Guest: Kevin Clark
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Producer: Steve Ceruti 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
